name: KailaniTheProphecy
description:
Story

The shaman of Kailanis home Island tells a prophecy where an ancient Evil will return and the only way to stop it is to find and wake up the Goddess of the Sea from her slumber. After hearing this our hero Kailani sails to the island of the goddess, where she will face many challenges!

In this current version of the game you will find no story cutscenes yet :3

Gameplay:

Kailani-The-Prophecy is a 3D Platforming Game, where you have to to find 6 FireBowls (each of them is located in one dungeon) and activate them in order to open the FinalTempleGate. The focus of this game is exploring with lots of collectables and hidden challenges spread across the island:

There are 999 Collectable Points and

30 Statues to be found: In order to reach them you must absolve small jump and run challenges

Keyboard Controls:

WASD - Moving

Space - Jump

E - Interact

P- Pause

Gamepad Controls:

Left AnalogStick - Moving

A - Jump

X- Interact

All Assets are made by me and the Sounds are from weLoveIndies ( I edited some of them with Reaper)

Special Thanks to Kjell, Jona, Jasmin, Kevin, Darwin, Elaha and everyone-else who helped or playtested :3
